6615  if(mhd_eta/=zero) call get_resistive_electric_field(ixi^l,ixo^l,sct,s,e_resi)
6616 
6617  ! if there is ambipolar diffusion, get E_ambi
6618  if(mhd_ambipolar_exp) call get_ambipolar_electric_field(ixi^l,ixo^l,sct%w,x,e_ambi)
6619 
6620  ! Calculate contribution to FEM of each edge,
6621  ! that is, estimate value of line integral of
6622  ! electric field in the positive idir direction.
6623  ! evaluate electric field along cell edges according to equation (41)
6624  do idim1=1,ndim
6625  iwdim1 = mag(idim1)
6626  do idim2=1,ndim
6627  iwdim2 = mag(idim2)
6628  do idir=sdim,3 ! Direction of line integral
6629  ! Allow only even permutations
6630  if (lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)==1) then
6631  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6632  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d+kr(idir,^d)-1;
6633  ! Assemble indices
6634  jxc^l=ixc^l+kr(idim1,^d);
6635  hxc^l=ixc^l+kr(idim2,^d);
6636  ! average cell-face electric field to cell edges
6637  fe(ixc^s,idir)=quarter*&
6638  (fc(ixc^s,iwdim1,idim2)+fc(jxc^s,iwdim1,idim2)&
6639  -fc(ixc^s,iwdim2,idim1)-fc(hxc^s,iwdim2,idim1))
6640  if(partial_energy) ein(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)
6641 
6642  ! add slope in idim2 direction from equation (50)
6643  ixamin^d=ixcmin^d;
6644  ixamax^d=ixcmax^d+kr(idim1,^d);
6645  el(ixa^s)=fc(ixa^s,iwdim1,idim2)-ecc(ixa^s,idir)
6646  hxc^l=ixa^l+kr(idim2,^d);
6647  er(ixa^s)=fc(ixa^s,iwdim1,idim2)-ecc(hxc^s,idir)
6648  where(vnorm(ixc^s,idim1)>0.d0)
6649  elc(ixc^s)=el(ixc^s)
6650  else where(vnorm(ixc^s,idim1)<0.d0)
6651  elc(ixc^s)=el(jxc^s)
6652  else where
6653  elc(ixc^s)=0.5d0*(el(ixc^s)+el(jxc^s))
6654  end where
6655  hxc^l=ixc^l+kr(idim2,^d);
6656  where(vnorm(hxc^s,idim1)>0.d0)
6657  erc(ixc^s)=er(ixc^s)
6658  else where(vnorm(hxc^s,idim1)<0.d0)
6659  erc(ixc^s)=er(jxc^s)
6660  else where
6661  erc(ixc^s)=0.5d0*(er(ixc^s)+er(jxc^s))
6662  end where
6663  fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)+0.25d0*(elc(ixc^s)+erc(ixc^s))
6664 
6665  ! add slope in idim1 direction from equation (50)
6666  jxc^l=ixc^l+kr(idim2,^d);
6667  ixamin^d=ixcmin^d;
6668  ixamax^d=ixcmax^d+kr(idim2,^d);
6669  el(ixa^s)=-fc(ixa^s,iwdim2,idim1)-ecc(ixa^s,idir)
6670  hxc^l=ixa^l+kr(idim1,^d);
6671  er(ixa^s)=-fc(ixa^s,iwdim2,idim1)-ecc(hxc^s,idir)
6672  where(vnorm(ixc^s,idim2)>0.d0)
6673  elc(ixc^s)=el(ixc^s)
6674  else where(vnorm(ixc^s,idim2)<0.d0)
6675  elc(ixc^s)=el(jxc^s)
6676  else where
6677  elc(ixc^s)=0.5d0*(el(ixc^s)+el(jxc^s))
6678  end where
6679  hxc^l=ixc^l+kr(idim1,^d);
6680  where(vnorm(hxc^s,idim2)>0.d0)
6681  erc(ixc^s)=er(ixc^s)
6682  else where(vnorm(hxc^s,idim2)<0.d0)
6683  erc(ixc^s)=er(jxc^s)
6684  else where
6685  erc(ixc^s)=0.5d0*(er(ixc^s)+er(jxc^s))
6686  end where
6687  fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)+0.25d0*(elc(ixc^s)+erc(ixc^s))
6688  ! difference between average and upwind interpolated E
6689  if(partial_energy) ein(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)-ein(ixc^s,idir)
6690  ! add resistive electric field at cell edges E=-vxB+eta J
6691  if(mhd_eta/=zero) fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)+e_resi(ixc^s,idir)
6692  ! add ambipolar electric field
6693  if(mhd_ambipolar_exp) fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)+e_ambi(ixc^s,idir)
6694 
6695  ! times time step and edge length
6696  fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)*qdt*s%dsC(ixc^s,idir)
6697  end if
6698  end do
6699  end do
6700  end do
6701 
6702  if(partial_energy) then
6703  ! add upwind diffused magnetic energy back to energy
6704  ! calculate current density at cell edges
6705  jce=0.d0
6706  do idim1=1,ndim
6707  do idim2=1,ndim
6708  do idir=sdim,3
6709  if (lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)==0) cycle
6710  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6711  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d+kr(idir,^d)-1;
6712  ixbmax^d=ixcmax^d-kr(idir,^d)+1;
6713  ixbmin^d=ixcmin^d;
6714  ! current at transverse faces
6715  xs(ixb^s,:)=x(ixb^s,:)
6716  xs(ixb^s,idim2)=x(ixb^s,idim2)+half*s%dx(ixb^s,idim2)
6717  call gradientx(wcts(ixgs^t,idim2),xs,ixgs^ll,ixc^l,idim1,gradi,.false.)
6718  if (lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)==1) then
6719  jce(ixc^s,idir)=jce(ixc^s,idir)+gradi(ixc^s)
6720  else
6721  jce(ixc^s,idir)=jce(ixc^s,idir)-gradi(ixc^s)
6722  end if
6723  end do
6724  end do
6725  end do
6726  if(nwextra>0) block%w(ixo^s,nw)=0.d0
6727  do idir=sdim,3
6728  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6729  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d+kr(idir,^d)-1;
6730  ! E dot J on cell edges
6731  ein(ixc^s,idir)=ein(ixc^s,idir)*jce(ixc^s,idir)
6732  ! average from cell edge to cell center
6733  jce(ixi^s,idir)=0.d0
6734  {do ix^db=-1,0\}
6735  if({ ix^d==-1 .and. ^d==idir | .or.}) cycle
6736  ixamin^d=ixomin^d+ix^d;
6737  ixamax^d=ixomax^d+ix^d;
6738  jce(ixo^s,idir)=jce(ixo^s,idir)+ein(ixa^s,idir)
6739  {end do\}
6740  where(jce(ixo^s,idir)<0.d0)
6741  jce(ixo^s,idir)=0.d0
6742  end where
6743  ! save additional numerical resistive heating to an extra variable
6744  if(nwextra>0) block%w(ixo^s,nw)=block%w(ixo^s,nw)+0.25d0*jce(ixo^s,idir)
6745  w(ixo^s,e_)=w(ixo^s,e_)+qdt*0.25d0*jce(ixo^s,idir)
6746  end do
6747  end if
6748 
6749  ! allow user to change inductive electric field, especially for boundary driven applications
6750  if(associated(usr_set_electric_field)) &
6751  call usr_set_electric_field(ixi^l,ixo^l,qt,qdt,fe,sct)
6752 
6753  circ(ixi^s,1:ndim)=zero
6754 
6755  ! Calculate circulation on each face
6756  do idim1=1,ndim ! Coordinate perpendicular to face
6757  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6758  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d-kr(idim1,^d);
6759  do idim2=1,ndim
6760  do idir=sdim,3 ! Direction of line integral
6761  ! Assemble indices
6762  if(lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)/=0) then
6763  hxc^l=ixc^l-kr(idim2,^d);
6764  ! Add line integrals in direction idir
6765  circ(ixc^s,idim1)=circ(ixc^s,idim1)&
6766  +lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)&
6767  *(fe(ixc^s,idir)&
6768  -fe(hxc^s,idir))
6769  end if
6770  end do
6771  end do
6772  ! Divide by the area of the face to get dB/dt
6773  where(s%surfaceC(ixc^s,idim1) > smalldouble)
6774  circ(ixc^s,idim1)=circ(ixc^s,idim1)/s%surfaceC(ixc^s,idim1)
6775  elsewhere
6776  circ(ixc^s,idim1)=zero
6777  end where
6778  ! Time update cell-face magnetic field component
6779  bfaces(ixc^s,idim1)=bfaces(ixc^s,idim1)-circ(ixc^s,idim1)
6780  end do
6781 
6782  end associate
6783 
6784  end subroutine update_faces_contact
6785 
6786  !> update faces
6787  subroutine update_faces_hll(ixI^L,ixO^L,qt,qdt,fE,sCT,s,vcts)
6788  use mod_global_parameters
6789  use mod_constrained_transport
6790  use mod_usr_methods
6791 
6792  integer, intent(in) :: ixI^L, ixO^L
6793  double precision, intent(in) :: qt, qdt
6794  double precision, intent(inout) :: fE(ixI^S,sdim:3)
6795  type(state) :: sCT, s
6796  type(ct_velocity) :: vcts
6797 
6798  double precision :: vtilL(ixI^S,2)
6799  double precision :: vtilR(ixI^S,2)
6800  double precision :: bfacetot(ixI^S,ndim)
6801  double precision :: btilL(ixI^S,ndim)
6802  double precision :: btilR(ixI^S,ndim)
6803  double precision :: cp(ixI^S,2)
6804  double precision :: cm(ixI^S,2)
6805  double precision :: circ(ixI^S,1:ndim)
6806  ! non-ideal electric field on cell edges
6807  double precision, dimension(ixI^S,sdim:3) :: E_resi, E_ambi
6808  integer :: hxC^L,ixC^L,ixCp^L,jxC^L,ixCm^L
6809  integer :: idim1,idim2,idir
6810 
6811  associate(bfaces=>s%ws,bfacesct=>sct%ws,x=>s%x,vbarc=>vcts%vbarC,cbarmin=>vcts%cbarmin,&
6812  cbarmax=>vcts%cbarmax)
6813 
6814  ! Calculate contribution to FEM of each edge,
6815  ! that is, estimate value of line integral of
6816  ! electric field in the positive idir direction.
6817 
6818  ! Loop over components of electric field
6819 
6820  ! idir: electric field component we need to calculate
6821  ! idim1: directions in which we already performed the reconstruction
6822  ! idim2: directions in which we perform the reconstruction
6823 
6824  ! if there is resistivity, get eta J
6825  if(mhd_eta/=zero) call get_resistive_electric_field(ixi^l,ixo^l,sct,s,e_resi)
6826 
6827  ! if there is ambipolar diffusion, get E_ambi
6828  if(mhd_ambipolar_exp) call get_ambipolar_electric_field(ixi^l,ixo^l,sct%w,x,e_ambi)
6829 
6830  do idir=sdim,3
6831  ! Indices
6832  ! idir: electric field component
6833  ! idim1: one surface
6834  ! idim2: the other surface
6835  ! cyclic permutation: idim1,idim2,idir=1,2,3
6836  ! Velocity components on the surface
6837  ! follow cyclic premutations:
6838  ! Sx(1),Sx(2)=y,z ; Sy(1),Sy(2)=z,x ; Sz(1),Sz(2)=x,y
6839 
6840  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6841  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d-1+kr(idir,^d);
6842 
6843  ! Set indices and directions
6844  idim1=mod(idir,3)+1
6845  idim2=mod(idir+1,3)+1
6846 
6847  jxc^l=ixc^l+kr(idim1,^d);
6848  ixcp^l=ixc^l+kr(idim2,^d);
6849 
6850  ! Reconstruct transverse transport velocities
6851  call reconstruct(ixi^l,ixc^l,idim2,vbarc(ixi^s,idim1,1),&
6852  vtill(ixi^s,2),vtilr(ixi^s,2))
6853 
6854  call reconstruct(ixi^l,ixc^l,idim1,vbarc(ixi^s,idim2,2),&
6855  vtill(ixi^s,1),vtilr(ixi^s,1))
6856 
6857  ! Reconstruct magnetic fields
6858  ! Eventhough the arrays are larger, reconstruct works with
6859  ! the limits ixG.
6860  if(b0field) then
6861  bfacetot(ixi^s,idim1)=bfacesct(ixi^s,idim1)+block%B0(ixi^s,idim1,idim1)
6862  bfacetot(ixi^s,idim2)=bfacesct(ixi^s,idim2)+block%B0(ixi^s,idim2,idim2)
6863  else
6864  bfacetot(ixi^s,idim1)=bfacesct(ixi^s,idim1)
6865  bfacetot(ixi^s,idim2)=bfacesct(ixi^s,idim2)
6866  end if
6867  call reconstruct(ixi^l,ixc^l,idim2,bfacetot(ixi^s,idim1),&
6868  btill(ixi^s,idim1),btilr(ixi^s,idim1))
6869 
6870  call reconstruct(ixi^l,ixc^l,idim1,bfacetot(ixi^s,idim2),&
6871  btill(ixi^s,idim2),btilr(ixi^s,idim2))
6872 
6873  ! Take the maximum characteristic
6874 
6875  cm(ixc^s,1)=max(cbarmin(ixcp^s,idim1),cbarmin(ixc^s,idim1))
6876  cp(ixc^s,1)=max(cbarmax(ixcp^s,idim1),cbarmax(ixc^s,idim1))
6877 
6878  cm(ixc^s,2)=max(cbarmin(jxc^s,idim2),cbarmin(ixc^s,idim2))
6879  cp(ixc^s,2)=max(cbarmax(jxc^s,idim2),cbarmax(ixc^s,idim2))
6880 
6881 
6882  ! Calculate eletric field
6883  fe(ixc^s,idir)=-(cp(ixc^s,1)*vtill(ixc^s,1)*btill(ixc^s,idim2) &
6884  + cm(ixc^s,1)*vtilr(ixc^s,1)*btilr(ixc^s,idim2) &
6885  - cp(ixc^s,1)*cm(ixc^s,1)*(btilr(ixc^s,idim2)-btill(ixc^s,idim2)))&
6886  /(cp(ixc^s,1)+cm(ixc^s,1)) &
6887  +(cp(ixc^s,2)*vtill(ixc^s,2)*btill(ixc^s,idim1) &
6888  + cm(ixc^s,2)*vtilr(ixc^s,2)*btilr(ixc^s,idim1) &
6889  - cp(ixc^s,2)*cm(ixc^s,2)*(btilr(ixc^s,idim1)-btill(ixc^s,idim1)))&
6890  /(cp(ixc^s,2)+cm(ixc^s,2))
6891 
6892  ! add resistive electric field at cell edges E=-vxB+eta J
6893  if(mhd_eta/=zero) fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)+e_resi(ixc^s,idir)
6894  ! add ambipolar electric field
6895  if(mhd_ambipolar_exp) fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)+e_ambi(ixc^s,idir)
6896 
6897  fe(ixc^s,idir)=qdt*s%dsC(ixc^s,idir)*fe(ixc^s,idir)
6898 
6899  if (.not.slab) then
6900  where(abs(x(ixc^s,r_)+half*dxlevel(r_)).lt.1.0d-9)
6901  fe(ixc^s,idir)=zero
6902  end where
6903  end if
6904 
6905  end do
6906 
6907  ! allow user to change inductive electric field, especially for boundary driven applications
6908  if(associated(usr_set_electric_field)) &
6909  call usr_set_electric_field(ixi^l,ixo^l,qt,qdt,fe,sct)
6910 
6911  circ(ixi^s,1:ndim)=zero
6912 
6913  ! Calculate circulation on each face: interal(fE dot dl)
6914  do idim1=1,ndim ! Coordinate perpendicular to face
6915  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6916  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d-kr(idim1,^d);
6917  do idim2=1,ndim
6918  do idir=sdim,3 ! Direction of line integral
6919  ! Assemble indices
6920  if(lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)/=0) then
6921  hxc^l=ixc^l-kr(idim2,^d);
6922  ! Add line integrals in direction idir
6923  circ(ixc^s,idim1)=circ(ixc^s,idim1)&
6924  +lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)&
6925  *(fe(ixc^s,idir)&
6926  -fe(hxc^s,idir))
6927  end if
6928  end do
6929  end do
6930  ! Divide by the area of the face to get dB/dt
6931  where(s%surfaceC(ixc^s,idim1) > 1.0d-9*s%dvolume(ixc^s))
6932  circ(ixc^s,idim1)=circ(ixc^s,idim1)/s%surfaceC(ixc^s,idim1)
6933  elsewhere
6934  circ(ixc^s,idim1)=zero
6935  end where
6936  ! Time update cell-face magnetic field component
6937  bfaces(ixc^s,idim1)=bfaces(ixc^s,idim1)-circ(ixc^s,idim1)
6938  end do
6939 
6940  end associate
6941  end subroutine update_faces_hll
6942 
6943  !> calculate eta J at cell edges
6944  subroutine get_resistive_electric_field(ixI^L,ixO^L,sCT,s,jce)
6945  use mod_global_parameters
6946  use mod_usr_methods
6947  use mod_geometry
6948 
6949  integer, intent(in) :: ixI^L, ixO^L
6950  type(state), intent(in) :: sCT, s
6951  ! current on cell edges
6952  double precision :: jce(ixI^S,sdim:3)
6953 
6954  ! current on cell centers
6955  double precision :: jcc(ixI^S,7-2*ndir:3)
6956  ! location at cell faces
6957  double precision :: xs(ixGs^T,1:ndim)
6958  ! resistivity
6959  double precision :: eta(ixI^S)
6960  double precision :: gradi(ixGs^T)
6961  integer :: ix^D,ixC^L,ixA^L,ixB^L,idir,idirmin,idim1,idim2
6962 
6963  associate(x=>s%x,dx=>s%dx,w=>s%w,wct=>sct%w,wcts=>sct%ws)
6964  ! calculate current density at cell edges
6965  jce=0.d0
6966  do idim1=1,ndim
6967  do idim2=1,ndim
6968  do idir=sdim,3
6969  if (lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)==0) cycle
6970  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6971  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d+kr(idir,^d)-1;
6972  ixbmax^d=ixcmax^d-kr(idir,^d)+1;
6973  ixbmin^d=ixcmin^d;
6974  ! current at transverse faces
6975  xs(ixb^s,:)=x(ixb^s,:)
6976  xs(ixb^s,idim2)=x(ixb^s,idim2)+half*dx(ixb^s,idim2)
6977  call gradientx(wcts(ixgs^t,idim2),xs,ixgs^ll,ixc^l,idim1,gradi,.true.)
6978  if (lvc(idim1,idim2,idir)==1) then
6979  jce(ixc^s,idir)=jce(ixc^s,idir)+gradi(ixc^s)
6980  else
6981  jce(ixc^s,idir)=jce(ixc^s,idir)-gradi(ixc^s)
6982  end if
6983  end do
6984  end do
6985  end do
6986  ! get resistivity
6987  if(mhd_eta>zero)then
6988  jce(ixi^s,:)=jce(ixi^s,:)*mhd_eta
6989  else
6990  ixa^l=ixo^l^ladd1;
6991  call get_current(wct,ixi^l,ixa^l,idirmin,jcc)
6992  call usr_special_resistivity(wct,ixi^l,ixa^l,idirmin,x,jcc,eta)
6993  ! calcuate eta on cell edges
6994  do idir=sdim,3
6995  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
6996  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d+kr(idir,^d)-1;
6997  jcc(ixc^s,idir)=0.d0
6998  {do ix^db=0,1\}
6999  if({ ix^d==1 .and. ^d==idir | .or.}) cycle
7000  ixamin^d=ixcmin^d+ix^d;
7001  ixamax^d=ixcmax^d+ix^d;
7002  jcc(ixc^s,idir)=jcc(ixc^s,idir)+eta(ixa^s)
7003  {end do\}
7004  jcc(ixc^s,idir)=jcc(ixc^s,idir)*0.25d0
7005  jce(ixc^s,idir)=jce(ixc^s,idir)*jcc(ixc^s,idir)
7006  end do
7007  end if
7008 
7009  end associate
7010  end subroutine get_resistive_electric_field
7011 
7012  !> get ambipolar electric field on cell edges
7013  subroutine get_ambipolar_electric_field(ixI^L,ixO^L,w,x,fE)
7014  use mod_global_parameters
7015 
7016  integer, intent(in) :: ixI^L, ixO^L
7017  double precision, intent(in) :: w(ixI^S,1:nw)
7018  double precision, intent(in) :: x(ixI^S,1:ndim)
7019  double precision, intent(out) :: fE(ixI^S,sdim:3)
7020 
7021  double precision :: jxbxb(ixI^S,1:3)
7022  integer :: idir,ixA^L,ixC^L,ix^D
7023 
7024  ixa^l=ixo^l^ladd1;
7025  call mhd_get_jxbxb(w,x,ixi^l,ixa^l,jxbxb)
7026  ! calcuate electric field on cell edges from cell centers
7027  do idir=sdim,3
7028  !set electric field in jxbxb: E=nuA * jxbxb, where nuA=-etaA/rho^2
7029  !jxbxb(ixA^S,i) = -(mhd_eta_ambi/w(ixA^S, rho_)**2) * jxbxb(ixA^S,i)
7030  call multiplyambicoef(ixi^l,ixa^l,jxbxb(ixi^s,idir),w,x)
7031  ixcmax^d=ixomax^d;
7032  ixcmin^d=ixomin^d+kr(idir,^d)-1;
7033  fe(ixc^s,idir)=0.d0
7034  {do ix^db=0,1\}
7035  if({ ix^d==1 .and. ^d==idir | .or.}) cycle
7036  ixamin^d=ixcmin^d+ix^d;
7037  ixamax^d=ixcmax^d+ix^d;
7038  fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)+jxbxb(ixa^s,idir)
7039  {end do\}
7040  fe(ixc^s,idir)=fe(ixc^s,idir)*0.25d0
7041  end do
7042 
7043  end subroutine get_ambipolar_electric_field
7044 
7045  !> calculate cell-center values from face-center values
7046  subroutine mhd_face_to_center(ixO^L,s)
7047  use mod_global_parameters
7048  ! Non-staggered interpolation range
7049  integer, intent(in) :: ixo^l
7050  type(state) :: s
7051 
7052  integer :: fxo^l, gxo^l, hxo^l, jxo^l, kxo^l, idim
7053 
7054  associate(w=>s%w, ws=>s%ws)
7055 
7056  ! calculate cell-center values from face-center values in 2nd order
7057  do idim=1,ndim
7058  ! Displace index to the left
7059  ! Even if ixI^L is the full size of the w arrays, this is ok
7060  ! because the staggered arrays have an additional place to the left.
7061  hxo^l=ixo^l-kr(idim,^d);
7062  ! Interpolate to cell barycentre using arithmetic average
7063  ! This might be done better later, to make the method less diffusive.
7064  w(ixo^s,mag(idim))=half/s%surface(ixo^s,idim)*&
7065  (ws(ixo^s,idim)*s%surfaceC(ixo^s,idim)&
7066  +ws(hxo^s,idim)*s%surfaceC(hxo^s,idim))
7067  end do
7068 
7069  ! calculate cell-center values from face-center values in 4th order
7070  !do idim=1,ndim
7071  ! gxO^L=ixO^L-2*kr(idim,^D);
7072  ! hxO^L=ixO^L-kr(idim,^D);
7073  ! jxO^L=ixO^L+kr(idim,^D);
7074 
7075  ! ! Interpolate to cell barycentre using fourth order central formula
7076  ! w(ixO^S,mag(idim))=(0.0625d0/s%surface(ixO^S,idim))*&
7077  ! ( -ws(gxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(gxO^S,idim) &
7078  ! +9.0d0*ws(hxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(hxO^S,idim) &
7079  ! +9.0d0*ws(ixO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(ixO^S,idim) &
7080  ! -ws(jxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(jxO^S,idim) )
7081  !end do
7082 
7083  ! calculate cell-center values from face-center values in 6th order
7084  !do idim=1,ndim
7085  ! fxO^L=ixO^L-3*kr(idim,^D);
7086  ! gxO^L=ixO^L-2*kr(idim,^D);
7087  ! hxO^L=ixO^L-kr(idim,^D);
7088  ! jxO^L=ixO^L+kr(idim,^D);
7089  ! kxO^L=ixO^L+2*kr(idim,^D);
7090 
7091  ! ! Interpolate to cell barycentre using sixth order central formula
7092  ! w(ixO^S,mag(idim))=(0.00390625d0/s%surface(ixO^S,idim))* &
7093  ! ( +3.0d0*ws(fxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(fxO^S,idim) &
7094  ! -25.0d0*ws(gxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(gxO^S,idim) &
7095  ! +150.0d0*ws(hxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(hxO^S,idim) &
7096  ! +150.0d0*ws(ixO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(ixO^S,idim) &
7097  ! -25.0d0*ws(jxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(jxO^S,idim) &
7098  ! +3.0d0*ws(kxO^S,idim)*s%surfaceC(kxO^S,idim) )
7099  !end do
7100 
7101  end associate
7102 
7103  end subroutine mhd_face_to_center
7104 
7105  !> calculate magnetic field from vector potential
7106  subroutine b_from_vector_potential(ixIs^L, ixI^L, ixO^L, ws, x)
7107  use mod_global_parameters
7108  use mod_constrained_transport
7109 
7110  integer, intent(in) :: ixis^l, ixi^l, ixo^l
7111  double precision, intent(inout) :: ws(ixis^s,1:nws)
7112  double precision, intent(in) :: x(ixi^s,1:ndim)
7113 
7114  double precision :: adummy(ixis^s,1:3)
7115 
7116  call b_from_vector_potentiala(ixis^l, ixi^l, ixo^l, ws, x, adummy)
7117 
7118  end subroutine b_from_vector_potential
7119 
7120  subroutine rfactor_from_temperature_ionization(w,x,ixI^L,ixO^L,Rfactor)
7121  use mod_global_parameters
7122  use mod_ionization_degree
7123  integer, intent(in) :: ixI^L, ixO^L
7124  double precision, intent(in) :: w(ixI^S,1:nw)
7125  double precision, intent(in) :: x(ixI^S,1:ndim)
7126  double precision, intent(out):: Rfactor(ixI^S)
7127 
7128  double precision :: iz_H(ixO^S),iz_He(ixO^S)
7129 
7130  call ionization_degree_from_temperature(ixi^l,ixo^l,w(ixi^s,te_),iz_h,iz_he)
7131  ! assume the first and second ionization of Helium have the same degree
7132  rfactor(ixo^s)=(1.d0+iz_h(ixo^s)+0.1d0*(1.d0+iz_he(ixo^s)*(1.d0+iz_he(ixo^s))))/(2.d0+3.d0*he_abundance)
7133 
7134  end subroutine rfactor_from_temperature_ionization
7135 
7136  subroutine rfactor_from_constant_ionization(w,x,ixI^L,ixO^L,Rfactor)
7137  use mod_global_parameters
7138  integer, intent(in) :: ixI^L, ixO^L
7139  double precision, intent(in) :: w(ixI^S,1:nw)
7140  double precision, intent(in) :: x(ixI^S,1:ndim)
7141  double precision, intent(out):: Rfactor(ixI^S)
7142 
7143  rfactor(ixo^s)=rr
7144 
7145  end subroutine rfactor_from_constant_ionization
7146 
7147 end module mod_mhd_phys

Definition: mod_global_parameters.t:151
